backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers and OKLCH variable definitions for light/dark themes, plus global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading fonts and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes and global layout with header, footer, transitions, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateCtaPlac: Card-based placeholder CTA component with title, description, and disabled external link button.
frontend/src/components/CinematicHero.ts: Cinematic hero section with parallax layers, autoplaying background video, overlays, and scroll navigation.
Interactive destination card with image hover effects, region/budget badges, tags, and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/components/HeroLineSketchOv: Renders an SVG overlay with gradient topographic lines and adjusts detail level based on screen size.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveIndia: Displays an India map with interactive region markers that show tooltips and navigate to filtered destinations.
frontend/src/components/MasonryGrid.tsx: A simple wrapper component applying a masonry layout class to its children.
Provides a fixed mobile bottom navigation bar with icons and active-route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/MotionReveal.tsx: Animates children into view using intersection observer–based fade and slide effects.
frontend/src/components/RippleButton.tsx: Enhances a button with a click ripple animation while preserving normal button behavior.
Fades content during route changes by listening to router load events.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with brand info, navigation links, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with scroll-based styling, desktop nav, mobile drawer, and theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/SocialProofGalle: Shows a horizontally scrollable gallery of social-style photo cards with usernames and captions.
frontend/src/components/TagChip.tsx: Renders a styled tag label with an icon based on the tag type.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Offers a dropdown menu to switch between light, dark, and system themes.
frontend/src/components/TrustBadges.tsx: Renders a set of trust badges with icons and labels using a styled flex layout.
frontend/src/data/destinations.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and sample data for travel destinations, including metadata, transport, accommodation, and FAQs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionReveal: Exposes a hook that reveals an element when it enters the viewport using IntersectionObserver with reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/hooks/useParallax.ts: Implements a parallax scroll effect hook with performance safeguards, reduced‑motion handling, and mobile adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook exposing backend actor and fetch status for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, dark mode styles, typography, and custom utilities for hero effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPage.tsx: Renders a blog listing page with a featured post, multiple post cards, and animated reveal sections.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Renders a single blog post page using a mock post object based on the slug, displaying metadata, content, and navigation back to the blog list.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPage.tsx: Shows budget-based destination categories with icons, descriptions, and tips, using animated cards and a structured grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/BudgetPlanningPage.ts: Provides a detailed budget planning overview with categorized travel budgets, descriptions, and example cost considerations using cards and tables.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community feature previews such as sharing stories, advice, and travel buddies, along with a notice about upcoming community features.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationDetailPage: Loads a destination by slug and presents its detailed info including hero image, snapshot, travel details, and fallback UI if not found.
frontend/src/pages/DestinationsPage.tsx: Lists destinations with search, tab filters, optional region filters, and dynamically filtered results rendered in a masonry grid.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, featured destinations, budget categories, and resource links using parallax and animated components.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Displays a resources hub featuring cards for destination guides, travel tips, budgeting, and planning tools.
frontend/src/pages/SafetyGuidePage.tsx: Provides safety information including emergency numbers and detailed health, location, and preparedness guidance in card format.
frontend/src/pages/TravelTipsPage.tsx: Shows travel tips through cards and an accordion with detailed advice on planning, packing, and staying connected.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and container settings with custom theme variables.
project_state.json: Defines project state, known issues, and feature requests focused on fixing region-based destination filtering and adding detailed destinations per region.
